foods.ingredients: CAKE-SUGAR, BLEACHED ENRICHED FLOUR (WHEAT FLOUR, NIACIN, REDUCED IRON, THIAMINE MONONITRATE, RIBOFLAVIN, FOLIC ACID), WHOLE EGGS, SOYBEAN OIL, WATER, HIGH FRUCTOSE CORN SYRUP, EMULSIFIER (PROPYLENE GLYCOL ESTERS OF FATTY ACIDS, SORBITAN MONOSTEARATE, POLYSORBATE 60, MONO- AND DIGLYCERIDES, PRESERVATIVES [PROPIONIC ACID, PHOSPHORIC ACID, SODIUM PROPIONATE]). CONTAINS 2% OR LESS OF EACH OF THE FOLLOWING: NONFAT DRY MILK, MODIFIED FOOD STARCH (CORN), COCOA (PROCESSED WITH ALKALI), SALT, SODIUM BICARBONATE, SODIUM ALUMINUM PHOSPHATE, DRIED EGG WHITES, CORN SYRUP, NATURAL AND ARTIFICIAL FLAVOR (MILK), SODIUM STEAROYL LACTYLATE, MODIFIED CELLULOSE, XANTHAN GUM, GUAR GUM, SODIUM BENZOATE (PRESERVATIVE), YELLOW 5, BENZOIC ACID (PRESERVATIVE), ARTIFICIAL COLOR, SOY FLOUR. ICING-SUGAR, VEGETABLE SHORTENING (PALM OIL, CANOLA OIL, MONO- AND DIGLYCERIDES, POLYSORBATE 60). CONTAINS 2% OR LESS OF EACH OF THE FOLLOWING: ARTIFICIAL COLOR, CORN STARCH, NATURAL AND ARTIFICIAL FLAVORS, SALT. SPRINKLES-SUGAR, VEGETABLE OIL (PALM, PALM KERNEL), CORNSTARCH, CONFECTIONER'S GLAZE, DEXTRIN, RED 40 LAKE, BLUE 1 LAKE, NATURAL AND ARTIFICIAL FLAVOR, SOY LECITHIN, YELLOW 6 LAKE, CARNAUBA WAX.

foods.ingredients: Ingredients: Sugar, PEANUTS, glucose-fructose syrup, glucose syrup, WHEAT flour (with added calcium, iron, niacin, thiamin), dried grapes, palm oil, cocoa butter, cocoa mass, skimmed MILK powder, whey powder (from MILK), whey permeate powder (from MILK), rice flour, MILK fat, emulsifiers (E442, sunflower lecithin, E476, E471, SOYA lecithin), salt, BARLEY malt extract, maize flour, flavourings, anti-caking agent (E170), raising agents (E500, E503), MILK proteins. MILK CHOCOLATE: MILK SOLIDS 14% MINIMUM.CONTAINS VEGETABLE FATS IN ADDITION TO COCOA BUTTER. MAY CONTAIN NUTS, EGG.
